title: Hashire! Shiroi Ookami
original_name: 走れ! 白いオオカミ
sinopse: A boy named Lasset who lives on a farm in the rural northern US makes a perilous trek through the wilderness to a sanctuary 300 miles to the north to save the life of a gray wolf that he had raised from a puppy after an incident in which the wolf kills the family dog.
